did.head: DESCRIPTIVE SUMMARY
did.unittitle: John Craig Freeman collection of media art, 1999-2003.
did.repository: Division of Rare and Manuscript Collections, Cornell University Library
did.abstract: Includes a bound volume of textual material relating to John Craig Freeman's art, and CDs and DVD of interactive artwork.

scopecontent.head: COLLECTION DESCRIPTION
scopecontent.p: Includes a bound volume of textual material relating to John Craig Freeman's art, and CDs and DVD of interactive artwork: Imaging Appalachia, in collaboration with Joe Champagne and April Street, 2000; The broken bridge, 2003 (evidently part of a series, Imaging place, documentary virtual reality by John Craig Freeman, theory by Gregory L. Ulmer); and Virtual Florida, in collaboration with Gregory L. Ulmer, Barbara Jo Revelle and William Tilson, 1999.

controlaccess.head: Names:
controlaccess.corpname: Rose Goldsen Archive of New Media Art.

userestrict.head: Restrictions on Use:
userestrict.p: Digital files may not be copied or downloaded without the permission of the Curator and artist(s).

phystech.head: Physical Characteristics and Technical Requirements:
phystech.p: System requirements for disk: Mac OS.
